name: run the dishes
description:
This is my submition for Jamulator 2021, made over the weekend of May 1st, 2020. I started pretty late so sorry for no sounds or nice visuals!

This simulation evokes the work of a dishwasher. The customers, floor staff, kitchen staff are all simulated (they even think weird generated phrases) and the restaurant and its menu are randomized. 

As the customers start to roll in, the kitchen and floor staff will start to give you things to clean.

Head to the dish pit and click through the hyperlinked tasks before the place comes to a halt. Thank you for playing!
